sep.gaia.renderer.layer

Interface DrawableLayer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLayer, BBoxDebugLayer, CompassLayer, CopyrightLayer, MarkerLayer, POILayer, ScreenshotLayer, TileLayer, WeatherLayer, WikipediaLayer

    public interface DrawableLayer
    This interface is implemented by all layer class in this application. It is used for the decorator pattern to work.
    Author:
    Johannes Bauer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(DrawableLayer layer)
      Let this DrawableLayer implementation add another DrawableLayer whose draw is called, after this DrawableLayer has finished its render process.
      void draw(javax.media.opengl.GL2 gl, float height)
      The render process of this layer takes place in this method.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        void draw(javax.media.opengl.GL2 gl,
        float height)
        The render process of this layer takes place in this method. After this layer has finished, it's calling it's calling another DrawableLayer to render its content (if another DrawableLayer is specified).
        Parameters:
        gl - The GL context in which the layers renders its content.
        height - The logical height of this layer. If a layer l2 should be drawn over l1, that are drawn via l1.draw(gl, h1) and l2.draw(gl, h2) respectively, then h2 must be greater than h1.

      • add

        void add(DrawableLayer layer)
        Let this DrawableLayer implementation add another DrawableLayer whose draw is called, after this DrawableLayer has finished its render process.
        Parameters:
        overlay -
